name: astro-full-starter
title: Astro Full Starter
desc: Clean boilerplate to start building your website ASAP
article:
• Multilanguage support: Astro native internationalization to help you translate your Astro project.
  • Search Engine Optimization: Preconfigured plugins which makes it easy to add SEO relevant tags to your pages.Â Automatically generates sitemap.xml and robots.txt for your Astro project during build.
  • React Components: Preconfigured to use React components in your Astro project. Just import and use them.
  • Tailwind v4: Use the power of Tailwind to greatly improve your productivity and enhance your developer workflow.
  • Prettier: For code consistency and mantainability.

github.name: astro-full-starter
github.description: A base Astro project to start building your website quickly and efficiently.
